lines.text: [Joseph is lying in a flooded ditch he'd set for Vincent aka 'The Teacher', having been shot in the crossfire between Vince and his own goons]
[Vincent empties the gun's chamber into Joseph]
I'm sorry you hate me... but I do love you.
All you need to say is two words... two specific words, though. What they are? 'Not. Guilty.'
Hey Joseph... look at your old man.
[Joseph sees Louie being blown up by a concealed bomb]
